articles.author: J. Kim Murphy
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Trap’ Chops Up $6.6 Million Opening Day, ‘Deadpool & Wolverine’ Reigning Again With Massive Second Weekend - Variety
articles.description: Marvel's 'Deadpool and Wolverine' will lead the box office again, as M. Night Shyamalan's 'Trap' opens and 'Harold the Purple Crayon' bombs.
articles.content: The self-proclaimed Marvel Jesus is in for a big second coming. Deadpool & Wolverine is dominating the charts again after earning $28.3 million on Friday. As the Ryan Reynolds-Hugh Jackman superh… [+3515 chars]
